name: prmths
summary: Nice dark clean easy to look at color theme
description: Dark theme with mostly blues and cyans, a little red and some yellow.... very easy to look at. enough contrast to be useful, not so much that it's an eye-strain. I stare at my screen for hours with this theme and don't get fatigued.
install_details:
put it in ~/.vim/colors
run 
:colo prmths
in vim
